content: Patient J2415-A8R (Theodore Wexler, dob 03/15/1978) underwent spinal cord stimulator implantation at Midwest Neurocare on 02/28/2024 for refractory neuropathic pain. Previous treatments included gabapentin and physical therapy. The provider, Dr. Elena Voss, submitted the pre-authorization request on 01/10/2024. Current estimated recovery period is 6-8 weeks with biweekly follow-ups.
